articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Search for Voyager 2 after Nasa accidentally sends wrong command - The Guardian
articles.description: Dish in Australia deployed to find interstellar spacecraft after flight control pointed its antenna away from Earth
articles.content:
Nasa is listening for any peep from Voyager 2 after it lost contact with the spacecraft billions of miles away.
Hurtling ever deeper into interstellar space, Voyager 2 has been out of touch ever sin… [+1401 chars]

articles.title: Scientists solve 'enigma' of pygmy right whales' feeding habits - Phys.org
articles.description: Researchers have shown from stable isotope ratios in the baleen of pygmy right whales that this species of baleen whales remains in waters off southern Australia year-round and feeds on Australian krill and copepods. Unlike larger relatives, they don't make s…
